# reverse()

**Instance Method**

Reverses the elements of the collection in place.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func reverse()
```

## Discussion

The following example reverses the elements of an array of characters:

```swift
var characters: [Character] = ["C", "a", "f", "é"]
characters.reverse()
print(characters)
// Prints "["é", "f", "a", "C"]"
```
title: reverse()
